articles.title: Another Kansas Republican scrambles to defeat Kris Kobach

articles.content: One of the most competitive gubernatorial contests in the country this year is in, of all places, Kansas – a ruby-red state that’s struggled badly after eight years of Republican governance. GOP voters have rallied behind right-wing Secretary of State Kris Ko… [+3860 chars]

articles.title: The Democrats' election message is clear (and it's not about Trump)

articles.content: Sen. Ben Sasse (R-Neb.) appeared on a Sunday show last month and raised a familiar complaint about politics: the parties aren’t focused on policy or problem-solving. There’s massive stuff happening in America, the Nebraska Republican argued, and these parties… [+3130 chars]
